title: Hypergraph-Guided Regex Filter Synthesis for Event-Based Anomaly Detection
summary: This paper proposes HyGLAD, an algorithm that automatically builds interpretable patterns to model event data for detecting event-based anomalies in stationary systems.
usefulness_reason: Score 60 assigned because the paper explicitly mentions "model event data" and "event-based anomalies". 'Event data' can be considered a form of point process data, and the modeling of it for anomaly detection implies the use of contextual information.
